title: Ticket #2068: Investigate authentication options for blahp-over-ssh
description:
Investigate options for ssh authentication for blahp-over-ssh. So far, we know of multiple options, none of which are ideal. We need to know more about the options we have, including ones we may be missing.

Options

  • User-started ssh-agent
    • Pro: No added credential management for Condor
    • Con: Credentials are lost if ssh-agent dies
  • Use condor_credd to store private decryption passphrases
    • Pro: Credentials not lost on machine reboot
    • Con: Unknown amount of additional code development to work
  • Use unencrypted ssh credentials
    • Pro: Credentials not lost on machine reboot
    • Con: Less secure
